WorkItem.Description:
Using Rawr 2.3.11 item 41400 - Thundering Skyflare Diamond, doesn't show up as a comparable meta gem for cat. - The item is in Rawr's database.
 
The effect is a chance to increase melee/ranged attack speed on hit.
 
According to the effect, it would be the 3rd best choice for most cats.
WorkItem.Summary: [Cat] Itemid: 41400 not showing up in list

Comments.Message:
It's never been modeled because it's such a low priority.
Find me any situation where it would useful, and I'll increase the priority of modeling it.
If the gem doesn't have the proc on it in your local copy, try refreshing it (or re-adding it from the item editor). It's an easy proc to model yourself and see how bad it is.

I thought it was an error as you could modify another gem with it's effect and take off the old bonuses, that makes the model yield the expected value of it. Reloading/refreshing it doesn't make it appear, but the effect does indeed seem to be modelled, it just doesn't show up.

I'm not sure there's any situation where it would be most useful, but it's still #3 in the list of many gems in the model.
